/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene of a two-lane road stretching into the distance, flanked by lush greenery on both sides. The road, appearing well-maintained, is devoid of any vehicles or pedestrians, adding to the tranquility of the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly in the top right corner, casting a warm glow over the entire landscape. The perspective of the image is from a low angle, looking down the road towards the horizon, creating a sense of depth and distance. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the vegetation contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
